description.original: 这个便捷的插件使您能够直接从文档中无缝管理附件和引用链接。利用直观的右键菜单,您可以高效地在LIVE和READ模式下处理资源。
description.translation: 这个便捷的插件使您能够直接从文档中无缝管理附件和引用链接。利用直观的右键菜单,您可以高效地在LIVE和READ模式下处理资源。

dict.name: \"clear all attachments in current: name: "清除当前文件中的所有附件"
dict..setName(\"Adaptive image display ratio: .setName("根据窗口大小自适应图片显示比例")
dict..setDesc(\"Select where you want Attachm: .setDesc("选择附件在删除后要移动到的位置")
dict..setDesc('Add a \"Move to...\" option to: .setDesc('在附件的右键菜单中添加一个“移动到...”选项')
dict..setDesc(\"Click the right half of the i: .setDesc("点击图片的右侧部分以详细查看图片。")
dict..setDesc(\"Turn on to enable drag to res: .setDesc("打开此选项以启用拖动调整图片大小的功能。")
dict.isMacOS ? \"Reveal in finder\" : \"Show: isMacOS ? "在查找器中显示" : "在系统资源管理器中显示")
dict..setDesc(\"When the image exceeds the wi: .setDesc("当图片尺寸超过窗口大小时,将根据窗口大小自适应显示图片。")
dict.Notice(name + \" moved to Obsidian Trash: Notice(name + " 移动到 Obsidian 回收站 !", SUCCESS_NOTICE_TIMEOUT)
dict.Notice(name + \" moved to System Trash !: Notice(name + " 移动到系统回收站 !", SUCCESS_NOTICE_TIMEOUT)
dict.Notice(\"Faild to delelte the \" + name: Notice("删除 " + name + " 失败!", SUCCESS_NOTICE_TIMEOUT)
dict.Notice(\"As other references of current: Notice("由于当前文件的其他引用存在,仅删除了当前引用链接而未删除实际文件。", 3500)
dict.Notice(\"Fail to find the link-text, ple: Notice("未能找到链接文本,请手动删除!", 0)
dict.Notice(\"Find multiple same Link in curr: Notice("在当前行中找到多个相同的链接,请手动删除!", 0)
dict.Notice(`Fail to find the link-text (for: Notice(`未能找到链接文本(对于 ${mode} 中的链接),请手动删除!`, 0)
dict.Notice(`Find multiple same Link in curre: Notice(`在当前 ${mode} 中找到多个相同的链接,请手动删除!`, 0)
dict.Notice(`Fail to rename for there alreay: Notice(`重命名失败,因为已存在文件 ${result}`)
dict.Notice(`Fail to move for there alreay ex: Notice(`移动失败,因为已存在文件 ${new_path}`)
dict.Notice(\"Faild to delete the file/folder: Notice("删除文件/文件夹失败 !", SUCCESS_NOTICE_TIMEOUT2)
dict.Notice(\"All attachments and its parent: Notice("所有附件及其父文件夹已删除!", 3000)
dict.Notice(\"Find multiple same image-link i: Notice("在当前行中找到多个相同的图像链接,请手动缩放!")
dict.Notice(`Fail to find current image-link: Notice(`在 ${mode} 中未能找到当前图像链接,请手动缩放!`)
dict.Notice(`Find multiple same image-link in: Notice(`在 ${mode} 中找到多个相同的图像链接,请手动缩放!`)
dict.Error(\"Unable to retrieve the image dat: Error("在三次重试后仍无法获取图像数据。")

dict.Continue to delete current file and its: 继续删除当前文件及其所有非多引用附件
dict.`Are you sure you want to delete \"${thi:
`您确定要删除 "${this.note.basename}.md" 吗？

它将被移动到您的 ${this.myPlugin.settings.deleteOption}.`
dict.`There are(is) currently [${getRefenced: `当前有 [${getRefencedLinkCount()}] 个非多引用链接指向此笔记。`
